name: Path Of Kuja
description:
A little top-down action-RPG on witch i work as a test, it' s very WIP and messy for now, but i' m making a more clean stage 1 and everything,  will be updated as soon as stage 1 is ready, and will add stages 1 by 1 after.

Controls :  arrows  for moving and space to attack , pad should work too.

Enjoy!
